alert.note: Alert for Custer; Oglala Lakota; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:08PM MDT until August 12 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... South central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 608 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Red Shirt, or 30 miles southeast of Rapid City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Red Shirt and southwestern Badlands National Park around 615 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
